Additional.Schema: Schema Models are mainly used for automatic data migration - For instance, adding or removing data parts of each entry in the database.
Additional.Selection: A Selection allows you to filter something from the database, and perform methods such as sorting, limiting and iterating to grab results and leave the database unchanged.
Additional.Transaction: Transactions should only be created in synchronous environments, as other data changed will also be included in the transaction - which can be rolled back, leading to unexpected results.
Additional.Gateway: This class is rather used than a Connection when initialised in a multithreaded Pool. Gateways will connect with the database thread, and asynchronously exchange data.
